title: Redkin + Redkin for Men logos
content:
Hi,  
Could anyone help me out with these ones?  
Any help would be greatly appreciated.  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RFM logo black.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619231721/http:/typophile.com/files/RFM%20logo%20black.jpg) | 215.31 KB |
| [Redken logo black.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619231721/http:/typophile.com/files/Redken%20logo%20black.jpg) | 253.38 KB |
author: Headjam

comments.content:
HI there

The same question was asked last year, no one could seem to find a match and thought it was hand drawn, here is the link

[http://www.typophile.com/node/12665](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619231721/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12665 "http://www.typophile.com/node/12665")

Like Mark said, get awfully close with [Palatino](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619231721/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.120971.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=REDKEN&sampleSize=70).
